name: Tower Defense - Tutorial Series
description:
This game was created along side the video tutorial series found on my channel at https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7b0IAO3AIx5a-dUvES3FK7mNMIKrfAPz

If you are already a Patreon supporter at the $5.00 tier you automatically have access to the source code at https://gamemakercasts.itch.io/tower-defense-tutorial-series/patreon-access
